name: Custom Death Image
description: Shows a custom image when you die.

rare-chance.name: Rare Image Chance(NO IMAGE YET)
rare-chance.description: Chance (%) of showing the rare death image (0 = never, 100 = always)

pip-mode.name: Enable PiP Mode
pip-mode.description: Show a small version of the death image in the corner while playing

pip-position.name: PiP Base Position
pip-position.description: Choose which corner to place the PiP window

pip-offset-x.name: PiP X Offset
pip-offset-x.description: Adjust horizontal position (negative = left, positive = right)

pip-offset-y.name: PiP Y Offset
pip-offset-y.description: Adjust vertical position (negative = down, positive = up)

pip-size.name: PiP Size
pip-size.description: Size of the PiP window as a percentage of screen width

meme-mode.name: Meme Mode(STILL WIP)
meme-mode.description: Enable for random meme images and sounds on death (overrides other settings)

use-custom-image.name: Use Custom Image
use-custom-image.description: Enable to use your own custom death image(s), default is zoink's golden freddy.

use-folder.name: Use Image Folder
use-folder.description: Enable to randomly cycle between images in a folder

show-in-practice.name: Show in Practice Mode
show-in-practice.description: Show death image in practice mode

custom-folder-path.name: Custom Folder Path
custom-folder-path.description: Select folder containing death images (PNG only)

min-percentage.name: Minimum Percentage
min-percentage.description: Only show death image after reaching this percentage (0 to disable)

death-duration.name: Death Image Duration
death-duration.description: How long to show the death image (in seconds)

use-custom-sound.name: Use Custom Death Sound
use-custom-sound.description: Enable to use a custom sound when dying

custom-sound-path.name: Custom Death Sound Path
custom-sound-path.description: Path to the custom sound file (.ogg or .mp3)

use-image-specific-sounds.name: Use Image-Specific Sounds
use-image-specific-sounds.description: Enable to use specific sounds for specific images (only works with custom folder, add the image's name with the extension of .mp3 or .ogg)

pip-use-custom-image.name: Use Custom PiP Image
pip-use-custom-image.description: Use a custom image for the PiP display

pip-image-path.name: PiP Image Path
pip-image-path.description: Path to the custom PiP image

show-in-practice.name: Show in Practice Mode
show-in-practice.description: Show death image in practice mode

death-duration.name: Death Image Duration
death-duration.description: How long to show the death image (in seconds)

min-percentage.name: Minimum Percentage
min-percentage.description: Only show death image after reaching this percentage (0 to disable)
